meanings.meaning: 1. study; scholarship; learning; education; knowledge 少しばかりの学問は危険なもの。A little learning is a dangerous thing.

学文 【がくもん】、学門 【がくもん】
学文: Out-dated kanji or kanji usage. 学門: Out-dated kanji or kanji usage.

sentences.translation: A little learning is a dangerous thing.
Psychology is the scientific study of the mind.
